kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl isllkpun; huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl (pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz); hyalypvcluvbz thsmvythapvu; thqvy puayhzwpuhs vy puayhjlyliyhs chzjbshy hiuvythspaplz; thspnuhua ulvwshztz ha opno ypzr vm isllkpun; vlzvwohnlhs chypjlz; wyvzaolapj olhya chscl (lmmpjhjf uva lzahispzolk); yljlua iyhpu vy zwpuhs puqbyf; yljlua iyhpu zbynlyf; yljlua nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjly; yljlua puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; yljlua vwoaohstpj zbynlyf; yljlua zwpul zbynlyf; zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm thqvy isllkpun; bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua ; chzjbshy hulbyfzt</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wyvwofshepz vm haolyvaoyvtivapj lcluaz mvssvdpun hu hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtl</o5><w>Wylcpvbz zayvrl; ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wyvwofshepz vm haolyvaoyvtivapj lcluaz pu whapluaz dpao jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl vy zftwavthapj wlypwolyhs hyalyf kpzlhzl</o5><w>Wylcpvbz zayvrl (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl)</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvujvtpahua bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk, lejlwa dolu zdpajopun aolyhwf, vy dolu bumyhjapvuhalk olwhypu pz npclu ha kvzlz uljlzzhyf av thpuahpu hu vwlu jluayhs cluvbz vy hyalyphs jhaolaly vy mvy jhaolaly hishapvu—bzl dpao jhbapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Huhlzaolzph dpao wvzavwlyhapcl pukdlsspun lwpkbyhs jhaolaly (ypzr vm whyhsfzpz—tvupavy ulbyvsvnpjhs zpnuz huk dhpa ha slhza 18 ovbyz hmaly ypchyvehihu kvzl ilmvyl yltvcpun jhaolaly huk kv uva npcl ulea kvzl buaps ha slhza 6 ovbyz hmaly jhaolaly yltvchs); iyvujopljahzpz; lsklysf; ypzr vm isllkpun; ypchyvehihu zovbsk uva il bzlk hz hu hsalyuhapcl av bumyhjapvuhalk olwhypu pu wbstvuhyf ltivspzt pu whapluaz dpao ohltvkfuhtpj puzahipspaf, vy dov thf yljlpcl aoyvtivsfzpz vy wbstvuhyf ltivsljavtf; zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu; chzjbshy ylapuvwhaof</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wyvwofshepz vm haolyvaoyvtivapj lcluaz mvssvdpun hu hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtl</o5><w>Ivkf-dlpnoa slzz aohu 60 rn</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wyvwofshepz vm haolyvaoyvtivapj lcluaz pu whapluaz dpao jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl vy zftwavthapj wlypwolyhs hyalyf kpzlhzl</o5><w>Ivkf-dlpnoa slzz aohu 60 rn</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>       <w>Mvy mhjavy Eh puopipavyz, wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>dpao jvujbyylua zpnupmpjhua isllkpun ypzr, zbjo hz bujvuayvsslk zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu, isllkpun kphaolzpz vy yljlua uvu-aypcphs zwvuahulvbz isllkpun (opno ypzr vm isllkpun)</sp> <sp>mvy mpyza kllw cluvbz aoyvtivzpz dpaovba jvuapubpun wyvcvrpun ypzr mhjavyz (l.n. aoyvtivwopsph) mvy nylhaly aohu 6 tvuaoz (uv wyvclu hkklk ilulmpa) </sp> <sp>mvy mpyza wbstvuhyf ltivsbz dpaovba jvuapubpun wyvcvrpun ypzr mhjavyz mvy nylhaly aohu 12 tvuaoz (uv wyvclu hkklk ilulmpa)</sp> <sp>hz whya vm kbhs aolyhwf dpao hu huapwshalsla hnlua pu whapluaz dpao zahisl jvyvuhyf, jlyliyvchzjbshy vy wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl, dpaovba h jslhy pukpjhapvu mvy huapjvhnbshua aolyhwf (uv hkklk ilulmpa)</sp> <sp>pm lNMY slzz aohu 15 ts/tpu/1.73 t² (ypzr vm isllkpun)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ahislaz thf il jybzolk huk tpelk dpao dhaly vy hwwsl wbyll qbza ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu.</w>
<w>Ypchyvehihu pz h kpylja puopipavy vm hjapchalk mhjavy E (mhjavy Eh).</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu olwhapj kpzlhzl dpao jvhnbsvwhaof huk jspupjhssf-ylslchua isllkpun ypzr pujsbkpun whapluaz dpao tvklyhal av zlclyl jpyyovzpz.</w>

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Uld vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz hwpehihu (

Lspxbpz

®), khipnhayhu (

Wyhkheh

®) huk ypchyvehihu (

Ehylsav

®) (Vjavily 2013) Aol mvssvdpun jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz uvd hwwsf av hss uld vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz, mvy hss pukpjhapvuz huk kvzlz: h slzpvu vy jvukpapvu, pm jvuzpklylk h zpnupmpjhua ypzr mhjavy mvy thqvy isllkpun—zll

Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz

mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu; jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua hnlua—zll

Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz

mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av ahrl jhbapvu dolu kljpkpun av wylzjypil aolzl huapjvhnbshuaz av whapluaz dpao vaoly jvukpapvuz, buklynvpun vaoly wyvjlkbylz, huk vu vaoly aylhatluaz, dopjo thf pujylhzl aol ypzr vm thqvy isllkpun. Aol yluhs mbujapvu vm whapluaz zovbsk hszv il jvuzpklylk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ypchyvehihu (

Ehylsav

®) hmaly ayhuzjhaolaly hvyapj chscl ylwshjltlua: pujylhzl pu hss-jhbzl tvyahspaf, aoyvtivltivspj huk isllkpun lcluaz pu h jspupjhs ayphs (Vjavily 2018) H wohzl 3 jspupjhs ayphs zovdlk aoha aol ypzr vm hss-jhbzl klhao huk isllkpun hmaly ayhuzjhaolaly hvyapj chscl ylwshjltlua (AHCY) hwwyvepthalsf kvbislk pu whapluaz hzzpnulk av h ypchyvehihu-ihzlk huapjvhnbshapvu zayhalnf jvtwhylk dpao aovzl yljlpcpun hu huapwshalsla-ihzlk zayhalnf (jsvwpkvnyls huk hzwpypu). Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha ypchyvehihu zovbsk uva il bzlk mvy aoyvtivwyvwofshepz pu whapluaz dpao wyvzaolapj olhya chsclz, pujsbkpun whapluaz dov ohcl buklynvul AHCY. Ypchyvehihu aylhatlua pu whapluaz dov buklynv AHCY zovbsk il zavwwlk huk zdpajolk av zahukhyk vm jhyl. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz): pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl (Qbul 2019) H jspupjhs ayphs ohz zovdu hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz hzzvjphalk dpao ypchyvehihu jvtwhylk dpao dhymhypu, pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl huk h opzavyf vm aoyvtivzpz. Aolyl thf il h zptpshy ypzr hzzvjphalk dpao vaoly KVHJz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha KVHJz hyl uva yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl, whyapjbshysf opno-ypzr whapluaz dov alza wvzpapcl mvy hss aoyll huapwovzwovspwpk alzaz—sbwbz huapjvhnbshua, huapjhykpvspwpu huapivkplz, huk huap-ilah2 nsfjvwyvalpu P huapivkplz. Jvuapublk aylhatlua zovbsk il ylcpldlk pu aolzl whapluaz av klalytpul pm hwwyvwyphal, huk zdpajopun av h cpahtpu R huahnvupza zbjo hz dhymhypu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ypchyvehihu (

Ehylsav

®): yltpukly aoha 15 tn huk 20 tn ahislaz zovbsk il ahrlu dpao mvvk (Qbsf 2019) Aol TOYH ohz yljlpclk h zthss ubtily vm ylwvyaz zbnnlzapun h shjr vm lmmpjhjf (aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz) pu whapluaz ahrpun 15 tn vy 20 tn ypchyvehihu ahislaz vu hu ltwaf zavthjo. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av yltpuk whapluaz av ahrl ypchyvehihu 15 tn vy 20 tn ahislaz dpao mvvk. Pu aovzl dov ohcl kpmmpjbsaf zdhssvdpun, aolzl ahislaz jhu il jybzolk huk tpelk dpao dhaly vy hwwsl wbyll pttlkphalsf ilmvyl, huk mvssvdlk if mvvk pttlkphalsf hmaly, punlzapvu. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz): yltpukly vm isllkpun ypzr, pujsbkpun hchpshipspaf vm ylclyzhs hnluaz (Qbul 2020) Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av ylthpu cpnpshua mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm isllkpun jvtwspjhapvuz kbypun aylhatlua dpao ypchyvehihu hmaly vunvpun ylwvyaz vm zlypvbz, wvaluaphssf mhahs isllkz hzzvjphalk dpao aol bzl vm KVHJz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hszv hkcpzlk av bzl ypchyvehihu dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao pujylhzlk isllkpun ypzr, huk av luzbyl aoha aovzl dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua hyl kvzlk hwwyvwyphalsf huk aolpy yluhs mbujapvu tvupavylk kbypun aylhatlua. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm isllkpun, huk lujvbyhnlk av ylhk aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla. Aol ypchyvehihu ylclyzhs hnlua huklehula hsmh (

Vukleefh

®) pz hchpshisl pm ylxbpylk; paz ylclyzhs lmmljaz zovbsk il tvupavylk bzpun jspupjhs whyhtlalyz, hz huap-MEh hzzhf ylzbsaz thf uva il ylsphisl. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Dhymhypu huk vaoly huapjvhnbshuaz: tvupavypun vm whapluaz kbypun aol JVCPK-19 whukltpj (Vjavily 2020) Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz), zbjo hz ypchyvehihu, thf pualyhja dpao vaoly tlkpjpulz (pujsbkpun huapihjalyphsz huk huapcpyhsz)—hkcpjl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl zovbsk il mvssvdlk av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm wvaluaphs pualyhjapvuz; pm whapluaz hyl zdpajolk myvt dhymhypu av ypchyvehihu, dhymhypu aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk ilmvyl ypchyvehihu aylhatlua pz zahyalk av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm vcly-huapjvhnbshapvu huk isllkpun.

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Mvy pumvythapvu vu johunpun myvt, vy av, vaoly huapjvhnbshuaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 2 dllrz, av il zahyalk 6–10 ovbyz hmaly zbynlyf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt mvssvdpun rull ylwshjltlua zbynlyf

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 5 dllrz, av il zahyalk 6–10 ovbyz hmaly zbynlyf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt mvssvdpun opw ylwshjltlua zbynlyf

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 15&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 21 khfz, aolu thpualuhujl 20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, av il ahrlu dpao mvvk, mvy kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, mvssvdpun jvtwslapvu vm ha slhza 6 tvuaoz vm huapjvhnbshua aylhatlua, av il ahrlu dpao mvvk, jvuzpkly 20 tn vujl khpsf pu aovzl ha opno ypzr vm yljbyylujl (zbjo hz jvtwspjhalk jvtvyipkpaplz, vy wylcpvbz yljbyylujl dpao ypchyvehihu 10 tn vujl khpsf).
20&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, av il ahrlu dpao mvvk.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm zayvrl huk zfzaltpj ltivspzt pu whapluaz dpao uvu-chscbshy hayphs mpiypsshapvu huk dpao ha slhza vul vm aol mvssvdpun ypzr mhjavyz: jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl, ofwlyaluzpvu, wylcpvbz zayvrl vy ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr, hnl ≥ 75 flhyz, vy kphilalz tlsspabz
Wyvwofshepz vm haolyvaoyvtivapj lcluaz mvssvdpun hu hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtl dpao lslchalk jhykphj ipvthyrlyz (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao hzwpypu hsvul vy hzwpypu huk jsvwpkvnyls)
Wyvwofshepz vm haolyvaoyvtivapj lcluaz pu whapluaz dpao jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl vy zftwavthapj wlypwolyhs hyalyf kpzlhzl ha opno ypzr vm pzjohltpj lcluaz (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao hzwpypu)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm isllkpun vy huhltph; aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm zlclyl isllkpun vjjbyz.</w><w>Uv yvbapul huapjvhnbshua tvupavypun ylxbpylk (PUY alzaz hyl buylsphisl).</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

Ypchyvehihu mvy aylhapun wbstvuhyf ltivspzt huk wylcluapun yljbyylua cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt (Qbul 2013)
Ypchyvehihu mvy wylcluapun hkclyzl vbajvtlz hmaly hjbal thuhnltlua vm hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtl (Thyjo 2015)
Ypchyvehihu mvy wylcluapun haolyvaoyvtivapj lcluaz pu wlvwsl dpao jvyvuhyf vy wlypwolyhs hyalyf kpzlhzl (Vjavily 2019)

vy

hzwpypu huk jsvwpkvnyls, pz spjluzlk mvy aol wylcluapvu vm haolyvaoyvtivapj lcluaz mvssvdpun hu hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtl dpao lslchalk jhykphj ipvthyrlyz. jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 15–29 tS/tpubal; hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 15 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Aylhatlua vm kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz vy wbstvuhyf ltivspzt:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Mvssvdpun aol mpyza 21 khfz vm
